high_descs: Turn to the right and face the desk.
Pick the book up from the desk.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on and pick up a book.

high_descs: Turn to the desk on your right.
Turn on the lamp in the back left corner of the desk.
Pick up the book between the book and the lamp.
move to the desk to the right of you
pick up a book from the desk
anns.task_desc: Inspect a book with a lamp.
